website_summaries.verdict: A well-made grill spatula with a sturdy blade and a handle that feels good in your hand.
pros: The blade is made of sturdy stainless steel that won't bend, even when lifting heavy foods
It's got a long handle to keep your hand away from the heat, plus the handle grip is made of wood so it stays cool
cons: Because of the wooden handle, this one's not dishwasher safe
It also doesn't have a serrated or beveled edge like some of its competition

customer_reviews.title: + Reviews are TRUE (PLEASE READ!)
customer_reviews.text: With such many perfect reviews, it is always suspicious. Indeed, at least 33% of them are written by VINE or otherwise solicited reviewers. Nevertheless, I want to confirm that the quality of this spatula is outstanding and really deserve an appropriate mark. Even the box feels so quality, great design and feel. Same thing about the spatula itself. It looks better in life than pictured. The bamboo handle sits naturally in hand, and the steel is really high quality. Good balance and feel. Recommend! Hope this info was helpful. Good luck with your choice!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Zona

customer_reviews.title: Not really for grilling
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this utensil because I needed a new grill spatula that had a long handle to avoid the heat but I didn't want the heavy weight of standard grilling utensils. The head is slightly smaller than I would have liked for this purpose but is still effective and doesn't rust, which was the main reason I elected to purchase this stainless steel spatula. I hand wash only as per seller recommendation, because I don't want to mess up the wooden handle. Overall, good balance, easy to handle and light, so I am happy with my purchase. Seller delivered as promised, good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: HSM

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful addition to my kitchen. Well made and strong. I've been using it for several weeks now on a daily basis. Will definitely be looking for Deiss brand when I purchase other kitchenware.
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good sized  sturdy spatula. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well made product. Can flip a 1.5 - 2 lb flatiron steak with ease. Doesn't bend under the weight. Easy to clean even after a sticky mess like bbq sauce. Handle is very comfortable . Would definitely buy again, but based on the quality I doubt I will have to for a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this spatula. I liked the first one so muchI got a second one. I initially purchased one for our new griddle to take camping. We purchased a second griddle for home and I knew we needed another Deiss spatula. It is sturdy and easy to use. I like the wooden handle. Best of all it didn't break the bank. Deiss should add to their line. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Millie L Cummings

customer_reviews.title: It has a good balance, feels very sturdy and the handle is ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. It has a good balance, feels very sturdy and the handle is confortable to grip. Very useful for dishing up things like apple pie, where the crust may be stuck just a little and you need to get underneath.
customer_reviews.author: firpo22

customer_reviews.title: Great quality metal spatula
customer_reviews.text: Great quality metal spatula. It has the perfect size to do cooking with. As a personal preference, I would have liked it to be a straight edge spatula. The wooden handle feels very nice on the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Juan P. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, light spatula
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new metal spatula to use indoors, this one looked like it was good quality and it is. It is light enough to flip eggs, but is made well and looks like it will hold up for a long while. I am sure it would work well for grilling also. I like the wooden handle also although you have to be more careful washing because of it. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Petlover

customer_reviews.title: Super nice, well-made, sturdy metal spatula
customer_reviews.text: I use cast iron pans and greatly dislike the plastic spatulas made for non-stick cookware. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: batndwn

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic item. Solid quality. Nice finish. Just the right length. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Patrick W McNabb III

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy but thin and feels great in my hand
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!!! My new favorite spatula. It's sturdy but thin and feels great in my hand. The wooden handle is just right :)
customer_reviews.author: Tim C.

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, well balanced, not too stiff and just flexible enough. Hand wash, don't let wooden handle sit in water. I really dig this spatula(I cook alot and appreciate well made cooking utensils
customer_reviews.author: zenkitty

customer_reviews.title: Grill and fry with ease
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for cast iron skillet. Slides under food easily and flips smoothly. Wooden handle grips well in hand. Stainless steel cleans with little effort. Fabulous spatula for indoor range or outside grill.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great Spatula
customer_reviews.text: For me this spatula is better than I could have hoped. Not too big or too small. Nice length 14”. The edges are finished in such a way that it is easy to clean. This is not something that just looks like a spatula, it is a well thought out and designed cook’s spatula/flipper.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor handle materials and construction
customer_reviews.text: I have used this spatula for 5 months. While it functions well, I don’t believe the handle construction is suitable for a “pro” moniker. The wood has split and is no longer tightly fastened to the tool. This was likely caused by the dishwasher. I guess I will go back to using my 30 year old riveted hardwood handled spatula that has seen thousands of dishwasher cycles and still has a tight handle.
customer_reviews.author: Rifflewater

customer_reviews.title: This is an ideal spatula for cast iron
customer_reviews.text: Because you are already hand washing cast iron pans, hand washing this spatula is not an issue. The sturdy steel blade is not a problem with cast iron as it would be for "coated" frying pans. It is also good for a right or left handed person.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Free

customer_reviews.title: A  bit too short for grilling
customer_reviews.text: This spatula was much shorter than anticipated as it was advertised as a bbq spatula. It is well built but too short for grilling in my opinion. I should have reviewed the specs for its length before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: DDW7

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! I’ve only had for a month so can’t comment on durability,but so far it has been great! Great packaging, easy to clean and seems pretty sturdy. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cambria79

customer_reviews.title: however as other reviewers have noted the handle is pretty cheap. There is glue visible to attach the ...
customer_reviews.text: The metal on this spatula is heavy-duty and well made, however as other reviewers have noted the handle is pretty cheap. There is glue visible to attach the wood to the metal, and the wood moves back and forth as it isn't properly attached. We'll see how long it lasts but I won't be purchasing again and would advise a different option for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Spatula. Heavy, and made well. The wood is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Vlollis

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for the grill
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a sturdy metal spatula for our weber kettle and this is great. The bamboo handle is comfortable and the metal is strong and the handle firmly attached. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: He's been wanting a good spatula and after reviewing this
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my hubby. He's been wanting a good spatula and after reviewing this, I don't put it in the washer. It's been a while and it's holding up nicely. Hubby happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Stathos

customer_reviews.title: I loved it when it arrived but the handle felt unstable
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when it arrived but the handle felt unstable. Sure, enough it cracked after only 5 weeks of occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Dabalos

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Spatula!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this spatula. It's long enough and definitely sturdy enough to use on the grill. Plus it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Long

customer_reviews.title: Too Large For Stove-Top
customer_reviews.text: If you have a large griddle or grill, this is your item. Too large/long for using in any fry pan I've got.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: A good sturdy heat and fire proof turner, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Lowrie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely good quality but it's too short for grilling in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely good quality but it's too short for grilling in my opinion. Wish I had paid attention to measurement length. My fault. I have no other use for it since I cannot use metal on my frying pans.
customer_reviews.author: Janel J

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Implement For BBQ!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Father's Day gift for my husband and he loves it! It does the job well and cleans up easily. It seems very sturdy too. Willing to consider buying more items from this brand. Thanks Deiss! Dianne I
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Di

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: This spatula is very attractive and seems durable, but it's smaller and shorter than it appears in the photo. Next time I'll get one with a longer handle and a bigger flat end.
customer_reviews.author: touchstone24

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy spatula and love the wooden handle on it. Bought this for my small BBQ as there is only me to cook for and was impressed with this spatula when I opened it and used it the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a high quality grill tool for our son-in-law for Christmas. We found this one, read about it and ordered it. We are very pleased with quality and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: IowaViking

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected, but very nice
customer_reviews.text: Has a very still blade. If you are looking for something metal and flexible, this is not it. Handle was a bit rough and not super comfortable, but all in all a nice spatula.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Flips burgers with ease!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband's birthday. He's a kitchen gadget snob and wanted a grill spatula that could flips burgers with ease, but was also sturdy. He's used this a couple of times and is quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: C. McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Top notch product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, sturdy steel spatula with comfortable, attractive wood handle. It's unlikely that it will last less than a lifetime. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Russell K.

customer_reviews.title: Beyond impressed
customer_reviews.text: First I’d like to say I highly recommend them. The spatula I ordered the first time , my package was stolen and no questions asked they sent me a new one!! I am not only impressed with their service but the quality of the spatula is just amazing for the price. Beautiful. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: LisaMone

customer_reviews.title: great construction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for my carbon steel. Really well made. quality materials. I did as suggested and conditioned with some butcher block oil.
customer_reviews.author: Drago

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Spatula
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased upon the receipt of this item. The contour of the head, the handles and just the overall design is very comfortable to me. It is a very useful tool with a bit of a retro look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I order more??? :)
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is a great product! The handle is really nice and when it arrived, my husband asked me why I didn't order two of them :)
customer_reviews.author: bek

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite go-to spatula!
customer_reviews.text: While I wasn't sure about this spatula once I ordered and saw it, I LOVE IT! Works better than our very expensive spatula and has quickly become the favorite for everyone! HIGHLY Recommend to anyone questioning - I'm ready to order a second one

customer_reviews.title: A solid kitchen tool...,
customer_reviews.text: Takes a lickin & looks as good as “Day 1”.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Many uses
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all uses, great in cast iron and on the grill. Very sturdy, handle is a little heavy but the rest makes up for it. Fine quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt Press

customer_reviews.title: Other than the turner I have with my grilling utensils I haven't had a spatula I've enjoyed the form and function of as much as
customer_reviews.text: While using my previous spatula I became very frustrated with its weak design and impulse bought a new one on Amazon. Other than the turner I have with my grilling utensils I haven't had a spatula I've enjoyed the form and function of as much as this one. Excellent product.

customer_reviews.title: Good product that holds up
customer_reviews.text: This is great for that cast iron skillet where plastic doesn’t do well I recommend this spatula

customer_reviews.text: Second Deiss product I've purchased and I'm still impressed with the quality. This is really a gorgeous spatula. Gonna look great with my "Kiss the cook" BBQ apron.

customer_reviews.title: Good Job

customer_reviews.text: It works perfect from the grill to my cast iron pans. What a great idea of the wooden handle.

customer_reviews.title: As listed.  I like it.

customer_reviews.text: This is well made, comfortable in the hand and easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Don't put it in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this four stars because the handle is getting loose. However, that may be my fault. It tells you not to put it in the dishwasher and I ignored that instruction. So it's probably my fault. Otherwise, it's a very nice spatula. If you buy this, don't put it in the dishwasher...

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be well constructed and sturdy, but it doesn't come with cooking book tips ...

customer_reviews.author: Jordan Gallant

customer_reviews.title: Too thick for pan use, handle not comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good but does not feel good in hand. The metal extends beyond edge of wood toward the front and sharp corners are not pleasant at all. Maybe ok for barbequing, but definitely not what I was looking for for a kitchen spatula. Blade is WAY TOO THICK. I bought this specifically to turn omelettes in a 10" slope-sided cast iron skillet (Lodge CS3), but the very thick blade is not suitable for this task. I used to have a spatula this shape with a nice thin blade and thought this one would be as well. Maybe ok for flipping burgers on a grill, but I already have a long handled BBQ spatula for that. Returned for refund..
customer_reviews.author: Alchymyst

product_meta.title: Deiss PRO Stainless Steel Spatula with Wooden Handle — Slotted BBQ Turner — Perfect for Grilling, Scraping, Turning Meat, Mixing Scrambled Eggs, Flipping Burgers - Comfortable Bamboo Handle
product_meta.description:
This turner will become your best kitchen helper

We all need plastic and silicone utensil set to protect nonstick cookware, but we also need a metal spatula for traditional pans, where thick plastic just won’t do. Meet your new favorite tool – the Deiss Stainless Steel Turner with Wooden Handle! It's perfect for everyday cooking tasks like sauteing, turning, stirring, mixing or barbecue. The sturdy stainless steel turner can easily hoist the heaviest loads. And thanks to the wooden handle, you can safely leave the turner near hot cookware and not burn yourself when picking up the turner with bare hands. The Deiss turner is thinner and sturdier than its plastic counterparts. Slots on the spatula reduce the friction of the food across the head, making it easier to slide the head under food.

Extremely easy to clean and store

The Deiss bbq turner is a real find for small kitchens and people who love to save space. The turner can be hung on a hook in small kitchens, or on a magnetic strip for ease of access while cooking. It won't take up much space in your drawer, unlike a pile of disposable plastic spatulas. You won't have problems with cleaning up. The stainless steel turner is easier to clean than plastic gadgets – it's usually enough to just wipe it with warm water.

Top Benefits

✓ Ergonomic wood handle for comfortable support
✓ Durable rust-resistant head
✓ Ideal for flipping burgers, mixing scrambled eggs, sauteing veggies and more
✓ Hanging hole makes storage easy



Lifetime Guarantee

Deiss Kitchenware provides a lifetime guarantee on all its product series.

Scroll up, click "Add to cart" and start your taste revolution!
feature_bullets: 💥 STURDY BRUSHED STAINLESS STEEL CONSTRUCTION : Durable and long lasting. Slotted ergonomic blade.
💥 ERGONOMIC BAMBOO HANDLE : Balanced and pleasant to the touch bamboo handle that doesn't hold heat.
💥 THOUGHTFUL DESIGN : Slotted head easily slides under your food. Hole in the handle for hanging.

💥 PERFECT FOR EVERYDAY COOKING : The Deiss turner has a flat front edge that can slip under any sort of food with ease. Turner can be used for sauteing veggies, turning meat, mixing scrambled eggs, flipping burgers, grilling fish and more. You can use the spatula when cooking noodles to do the taste test, since you can easily capture a noodle and drain the water through the slots in the turner's head.
💥 LIFETIME WARRANTY : Deiss Kitchenware provides a lifetime warranty on all our products. Plus you'll get the BONUS - exclusive "Healthy Cooking Tips" ebook, valued at $9.95 - absolutely FREE!
